A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Watery plot that creates no character arcs for the protagonists. The main characters learn very little and the audience is shown that the entire plot was a \"failure\" with no consequence besides a romance between Rose and Finn. \n\nConfusing lack of fan-service compared to TFA. Why not deliver on the fans expectations like all of the Marvel super hero movies do? Why is Star Wars the film-makers experiment with making a new type of drama instead of a fun wizard fantasy/adventure movie like all of the rest? The result is a movie that feels forced and has too many fake-outs and plot-twists that its impossible to feel invested in the story or characters.
